urls.title: Aeroméxico
urls.description: If the country you wish to travel to requires a PCR test for entry, please check the following information. Learn more Get preferential costs and delivery times for your COVID-19 detection test. For you own safety and that of others, the use of face masks is mandatory both in the airport and throughout your journey. A negative COVID –19 PCR test result is not required to travel to or within Mexico. However, you may need to provide a negative test result if you have a connecting flight from Mexico to a

urls.title: cookie
urls.description: Changes are not allowed (flight, date, time, destination). If you missed your flight (No show) and failed to notify it, your ticket will be cancelled (additional complements plus included taxes). For any flight segments subsequent to an unused segment, you must contact our Call Center within 24 hours after the first flight in order to use the remaining segments. Changes on the day of the flight are not allowed. Non-refundable Cannot be combined with other Fare Families Choose your seat for an additional

data.text: @haley Free of charge seat is assigned randomly for free, at the airport when the check in is completed. You can check over this information at the following link: https://t.co/ckUBfxoRMd
